meanings.sent1: The interindividual differences in the group were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The study focused on interindividual relationships within the community.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to observe the interindividual dynamics during the team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: The interindividual connections formed a web of social interactions.
meanings.sent5: The interindividual bond between the siblings was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving interactions between individuals.
meanings.sent1: Effective communication is key to interindividual understanding.
meanings.sent2: The interindividual communication skills of the team members varied.
meanings.sent3: The interindividual chatter in the room was overwhelming but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her smile created an interindividual bridge between strangers.
meanings.sent5: The interindividual dynamics at the party were fascinating to observe.
